divs: Sighting Detailsok here is what happens nearly every night these lights look like a star but they are too bright to be stars they are low to the horizon .this first light comes around 8:05 every evening then leaves around 8:45 or so stars dont move .but not only this there was another 1 last nite on oct 4th at around 9:30 or so.this was awesome in brightness it has many colors to it .but the most distinctive colors were red ,blue and white .with a telescope or binoculars you can see rotation to it.we watched this object for 45 mins or so then it just slowly flys off to the north .these are not ballons ,flares ,planes ,helicopters, venus ,chinese lanterns,these objects move slowly .i have seen these objects multiply into 2objects.we have seen them blink out ,i mean totally disappear to nothing then reappear then slowly diasppear,always moving slowly.nothing like you hear about speeds not recordable i have pics i will send you upon your request and will have videos also if you are interested.this is so strange .i have many witnesses.i want to be disproved tell me these are planes ,helicopters ,flares ,chinese lanterns ,or blimps .iam tired of hearing these remarks .what we see are unidefied flying objects,and we want to know what the hell these things are.thank you ronald krages
Summary: looks similar to a star but these move slowly nearly every night
trends: There have been 67 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around October 4th 2008
